alert.note: Alert for St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. John The Baptist Parish through 645 PM CDT... At 619 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wallace, or near Reserve, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wallace, Edgard and South Vacherie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
